name: Build an Online Business With Shopify and Amazon
seo_description:
Learn how to build an e-commerce business using Shopify and Amazon.
Identifying a product to sell, import it from global suppliers and creating a killer listing on Amazon and build a high converting, optimized online store through Shopify.
description: Learn how to build an e-commerce business using Shopify and Amazon. Identifying a product to sell, import it from global suppliers and creating a killer listing on Amazon and build a high converting, optimized online store through Shopify.
instructor_names: Erik  Rogne & Eric Campbell, Damiano Raveenthiran, Rita Cidre, Carrie French, and Jon Youshaei

product_prices.price_name: Build an Online Business With Shopify and Amazon
